00021 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_DYNAMICBUFFER_H
00022 #define HYPERTABLE_DYNAMICBUFFER_H
00023 
00024 extern "C" {
00025 #include <stdint.h>
00026 #include <string.h>
00027 }
00028 
00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00031   class DynamicBuffer {
00032 
00033   public:
00034 
00035     DynamicBuffer() : base(0), ptr(0), size(0), own(true) { }
00036 
00037     DynamicBuffer(size_t initial_size, bool own_buffer=true) {
00038       size = initial_size;
00039       own = own_buffer;
00040       if (size)
00041         base = ptr = new uint8_t [ size ];
00042       else
00043         base = ptr = 0;
00044     }
00045 
00046     ~DynamicBuffer() { if (own) delete [] base; }
00047 
00048     size_t remaining() const { return size - (ptr-base); }
00049 
00050     size_t fill() const { return ptr-base; }
00051 
00052     void ensure(size_t len) {
00053       if (len > remaining())
00054         grow((size_t)((fill()+len) * 3 / 2));
00055     }
00056 
00057     void reserve(size_t len, bool nocopy = false) {
00058       if (len > remaining())
00059         grow(fill() + len, nocopy);
00060     }
00061 
00062     uint8_t *addNoCheck(const void *data, size_t len) {
00063       if (data == 0)
00064         return 0;
00065       uint8_t *rptr = ptr;
00066       memcpy(ptr, data, len);
00067       ptr += len;
00068       return rptr;
00069     }
00070 
00071     uint8_t *add(const void *data, size_t len) {
00072       if (len > remaining())
00073         grow((size_t)(1.5 * (size+len)));
00074       return addNoCheck(data, len);
00075     }
00076 
00077     void set(const void *data, size_t len) {
00078       ptr = base;
00079       add(data, len);
00080     }
00081 
00082     void clear() {
00083       ptr = base;
00084     }
00085 
00086     void free() {
00087       if (own)
00088         delete [] base;
00089       base = ptr = 0;
00090       size = 0;
00091     }
00092 
00093     uint8_t *release(size_t *lenp=0) {
00094       uint8_t *rbuf = base;
00095       if (lenp)
00096         *lenp = fill();
00097       ptr = base = 0;
00098       size = 0;
00099       return rbuf;
00100     }
00101 
00102     void grow(size_t newSize, bool nocopy = false) {
00103       uint8_t *newBuf = new uint8_t [ newSize ];
00104 
00105       if (!nocopy && base)
00106         memcpy(newBuf, base, ptr-base);
00107 
00108       ptr = newBuf + (ptr-base);
00109       if (own)
00110         delete [] base;
00111       base = newBuf;
00112       size = newSize;
00113     }
00114 
00115     uint8_t *base;
00116     uint8_t *ptr;
00117     uint32_t size;
00118     bool own;
00119   };
00120 
00121 }

00123 #endif // HYPERTABLE_DYNAMICBUFFER_H
